name: The Dark Mod
notes: If you have a second monitor - unplug it before running the game.

execute.description: Downloading The Dark Mod, please wait

content:
exe: thedarkmod.x64
files:
- updater: http://tdmcdn.azureedge.net/various/beta207_01/tdm_update.linux64
installer:
- extract:
    file: updater
- chmodx: tdm_update.linux
- execute:
    description: Downloading The Dark Mod, please wait
    file: $GAMEDIR/tdm_update.linux -noselfupdate
